plants.name: Pothos
plants.description: Not only will this plant's marble-patterned, heart-shaped leaves charm you for years to come, but she's the perfect beginner plant; hard to kill and easy to grow.

plants.name: ZZ Plant
plants.description: The ZZ is everything you'd want in a beginner plant. Stunning + impossible to kill + air-purifying = houseplant perfection.

plants.name: Rubber Tree
plants.description: The OG of houseplants, this dark and timeless beauty will be a staple in your home for years to come. Set her near a window in indirect light and watch her shine.

plants.name: Peperomia
plants.description: Not one for direct sunlight, this chick likes to play it cool in the background. She doesn't need much to keep her signature verdant leaves looking glossy, thick, and vibrant.
